name: SKProductsRequest
desc: An object that can retrieve localized information from the App Store about a specified list of products.

items.name: init(productIdentifiers: Set<String>)
items.desc: Initializes the request with the set of product identifiers.

items.name: var delegate: SKProductsRequestDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate that receives the response of the app's products request.

items.name: protocol SKProductsRequestDelegate
items.desc: A set of methods the delegate implements so it receives the product information your app requests.
